data.title: U.S. Air Force ROTC
data.meta_description: Learn more about the Air Force ROTC program at Smith College. Prepare for a rewarding career in the U.S. Air Force or Space Force. Enroll Today.
data.text:
Smith College

Smith College has a crosstown agreement with University of Massachusetts—Det 370. Typically, this means you’ll be enrolled as a full time student at Smith College and take your ROTC classes each week at University of Massachusetts—Det 370.

Host School

University of Massachusetts—Det 370

This is a private school.
